item.description:
UPDATE PLEASE READ!!!
=========================

FREE JAGER SHOTS FOR THE FIRST 50 PEOPLE!!! 

COSTUMES ARE VERY WELCOMED FOR THE NIGHT TOO!!!

 ==================================================
Alright once again we're doing it big. Last month was Diesel this time its even BIGGER :)

 If you got the moves like Jagger come down and show us what you got in a pre Halloween bash with the Jager girls at the hottest spot in down town New Haven, Lazy Lizard 201 Crown Street.

 We'll have a buffet from 9:00-10:30 with some delicious food. You'll also get a FREE complementary shot of Jager, plus the Jager Girls will be in the building handing out giveaways like t-shirts, hats, etc throughout the night.

 Usually, all this goes for about $25 bucks but we've worked out a deal with the venue  for $10.

Lazy Lizzard just spent millions renovating their interior. The downstairs looks SICK - like an NYC style nightclub... aaaaand that's where we'll be partying!!

 

2 DJs that night. DJ Chris will be opening up that night with the best of Top 40. Followed by the best in Euro/Dance music by Pav Lov. You do not want to miss this.  

Add some spook to the night by coming in your halloween costume.

 A professional photographer will be on scene taking shots so bring  ur swagger! lol

 So if you got the moves like Jagger show it off at the Pre Holloween Bash with the Jager Girls at Lazy Lizard... Be There - this is one to remember!!!

 

Lazy Lizard

201 Crown Street

New Haven CT
item.how_to_find_us: Me and Anton (Pav Lov) Will be DJing in the Lower Level of Lazy Lizard
item.name: We're Taking Over New Haven @ Night - Lazy Lizard Cafe
